text: Bantoma batosaki. Boye, na tongo-tongo, bakotaki na Tempelo mpe bakomaki koteya bato. Tango mokonzi ya Banganga-Nzambe mpe bato oyo basalaka na ye elongo bakomaki, babengisaki Likita-Monene—lisanga mobimba ya bakambi ya bana ya Isalaele—mpe bapesaki mitindo ete bakende kozwa bantoma na boloko.
